bwwExcerpt: Yet the pricey bells and whistles distract from what is a so-so, overly dreary staging that is often undermined by its own overwrought machinations. Undeniably slick and handsome, this two-hour-and-forty-five-minute musical feels much longer than it should. That’s because, bizarrely for a production that is so determined to get its audience wasted, it’s hesitant to have too much fun itself.

keyPhrases.quote: so-so, overly dreary staging that is often undermined by its own overwrought machinations
feels much longer than it should
